section.title: SSHD Strict Mode Checking
section.para: Configures the secure shell daemon to use strict mode checking of the home directory configuration files. This setting ensures that the sshd related files/directories in the users home account are not world writable.

For all operating systems, the /etc/ssh/sshd_config file will be examined. If present, the values for the 'StrictModes' settings will be examined. If the setting is not 'yes', then it will be corrected.

listitem.para: GEN005536 - The SSH daemon must perform strict mode checking of home directory configuration files.
